title: 82/909/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 December 1982 approving the extended plan for the eradication of brucellosis put forward by the United Kingdom (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 December 1982
approving the extended plan for the eradication of brucellosis put forward by the United Kingdom
(Only the English text is authentic)
(82/909/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The extended plan for the eradication of brucellosis, as applied by the United Kingdom from 15 May to 31 December 1981, is hereby approved.
Financial participation by the Community shall be in respect of eligible expenditure on account of slaughterings taking place on or after 15 May 1981 up to 31 December 1981.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
